properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 11:32PM EST until February 13 at 3:25PM EST by NWS Wilmington OH
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers...

Ohio Brush Creek above West Union

The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Ohio Brush Creek above West Union
* through Thursday afternoon.
* At 11 PM the stage was 10.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 15 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* The river will rise above flood stage by early Thursday morning and
continue to rise to near 16.5 feet by early Thursday morning. The river will
fall below flood stage by late Thursday morning.
* At stages near 17 feet, flooding occurs along State Route 348 near
Compton Hill Road.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...Do not drive your car through flooded roadways. The
water depth may be deeper than it appears.


Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather All Hazards
radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
